headline: Baidu And Uber Test Apollo Go Robotaxis In Dubai For Global Scale
summary: Baidu (NasdaqGS:BIDU) is partnering with Uber to bring its Apollo Go autonomous ride hailing service to Dubai. The two companies plan to deploy driverless robotaxis in the city, making this Baidu’s first Apollo Go launch outside China. The move expands Baidu’s autonomous driving presence into the Middle East and connects its technology with a global ride hailing platform. Baidu runs a broad technology business that includes search, AI and autonomous driving, with Apollo Go as its commercial...

headline: New CA DMV Numbers Show Uber Robotaxi Partner Nuro Could Not Go 700 Miles Without Human Intervention; Company Seeks Liability Shield Via Ballot Measure, Says Consumer Watchdog
summary: According to an analysis by Consumer Watchdog, new data from the DMV shows that Uber's robotaxi partner Nuro has racked up less than 160,000 miles of testing on California roads in 2025, compared to millions of miles driven by Waymo and Zoox, and was unable to go 700 miles without human intervention.
